name: Alarm clock
description: Because Dwellers that sleep in are sent to the Wasteland.

name: Baseball glove
description: Catch a baseball, rock or grenade and throw it right back.

name: Duct tape
description: Keep things in place with every handyman's secret weapon.

name: Yarn
description: Keep cats entertained and make fabulous outfits.

name: Magnifying glass
description: This ant immolator might not work as well on Radroaches.

name: Desk fan
description: Great at keeping the Wasteland heat away. If it worked.

name: Toy car
description: Brings you back to the care-free days of being a kid in the Vault.

name: Camera
description: Investigate hidden truths or take Vault family portraits.

name: Brahmin hide
description: Great for making a full-grain leather jacket. Two heads means two hoods!

name: Wonderglue
description: Be careful not to glue your hands together or your eyelids shut.

name: Teddy bear
description: Wasteland life is no picnic, so he's always ready for a warm hug.

name: Microscope
description: Probably more useful in the Wasteland as a blunt weapon.

name: Shovel
description: Versatile and reliable. No Dweller should be without one.

name: Globe
description: Look back at the world that was. Or just spin it when you're bored.

name: Military circuit board
description: Top-of-the-line circuitry to make top-of-the-line equipment.

name: Yao guai hide
description: Don't mess with me, your hide-made outfits will say.

name: Military duct tape
description: Don't mess with me, your hide-made outfits will say.

name: Tri-fold flag
description: Never forget the good ol' red, white and blue.

name: Chemistry flask
description: Lets everyone know you're serious about doing sciency things.

name: Giddyup Buttercup
description: Go ahead, no one's watching. Get on and take a ride.

name: Gold watch
description: For when a weapon or outfit needs just a touch of bling.
